Function Documentation

◆ HeapSort()

void HeapSort ( int  n,
register int  ra[],
register int  rb[] 
)

Sort Key array in ascending order using heap sort algorithm. Also sort Index array that is tied to the key array.

Parameters
nNumber of elements to sort
raKey array [1..n]
rbIndex array [1..n]
Returns
none
Note
Exceptions: none
History: Tue Feb 19 10:24:24 MST 1991, RWM, Created.

1240  l = (n >> 1) + 1;
1241  ir = n;
1242  for (;;) {

1244  rra = ra[--l];
1245  rrb = rb[l];
1246  }
1247  else {

1249  rrb = rb[ir];

1251  rb[ir] = rb[1];
